Srabanti Chatterjee Wiki | Biography | Age | Height | Boyfriend | Husband

Bolly Reporter
1 month ago

Srabanti Chatterjee (শ্রাবন্তী চট্টোপাধ্যায়) is a Tollywood popular actress who is well known as named Srabanti and appears in Bengali movies. She is one of the most popular actress in the Bengali film industry mostly among youngsters. She is from a conservative family, but her friends encouraged her to enter the acting world.

Biography & Wiki

Srabanti Chatterjee’s Nickname is Srabanti. She was born on 13 August 1987 in Gujarat, India in a Hindu Bengali Brahmin family. Hence, her current age is 32 years. Srabanti’s Zodiac is Leo.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Her father’s name is not available. By profession, her father works in CESE-Continuing education for science and engineering. Her mother is a homemaker. She has one elder sister name is Smita Chatterjee.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Srabanti Chatterjee married to a film director, Rajib Biswas in 2003. They have a boy named Zinuk. Recently, the couple’s relationship had deteriorated and Srabanti sent a legal notice to the Rajib Biswas for divorce. Her son currently studying in class eight.

Srabanti again married Krishan Vraj, a model and photographer in July 2017 after a year courtship. The couple met each other a year ago in Mumbai and fall in love. After the marriage, she posts a photo on Twitter where Srabanti has told, ‘The royal journey begins’.

After only 85 days together the couple called it quit and they got mutually divorced. She had no allegation to the Krishan Vraj and wishes a good future life for him. Srabanti confesses to media that she got divorced from Vraj and wants to concentrate on work and son’s study.

Srabanti married Roshan Singh in 2019. The couple currently has a happy married life.

Education and School, College

Srabanti completed her schooling from Sarada Vidyapith Girls High School, Kolkata, India. After that, she completed her graduation from Visvesvaraya Technological University.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Srabanti Chatterjee filmography

Srabanti started her acting career in the 1997 film “Mayar Badhon” as a child artist Maya. In 2003 she got her first lead role opposite ‘Jeet’ in Rabi Kinagi’s direct film ‘Champion‘ as a Kabita. She is a successful Indian Bengali film actress who comes to limelight around the Tollywood film industry with her debut movie. However, her film career being interrupted after her marriage with Rajib Biswas.

In 2008, Srabanti comes back to the showbiz arena with the film Bhalobasa Bhalobasa. She acted in the blockbuster movie Deewana with co-actor Jeet and directed by Rabi Kinagi in 2013. She also acted with Tollywood superstar Dev in the movie Bindaas directed by Rajib Biswas.

Srabanti Chatterjee debut in the Bangladeshi film with the movie Shikari with co-actor Shakib Khan, King Khan of Bangladesh. This is the joint venture movie of Bangladesh and India. The action thriller movie is directed by Joydip Mukherjee under Bangladeshis production house Jaaz Multimedia.

In her 22 years acting journey she works in more than 30 films. Not only films she also works in the television industry as a Judge and Many telefilms. Some of her telefilms are “Chhadmabeshi”, “Shortcut Prem”, “Golper Nayika”, “Hothat Hawa”. Srabanti appeared as a Judge in a dance reality show “Dance Bangla Dance Junior Season 9” and Season 10 along with Jisshu Sengupta and Ankush Hazra.

Awards & Recognitions

  • In 2014 Srabanti won the Telecine awards in ‘Best Juti With Dev‘ category in ‘Buno Haansh‘ Movie.
  • In 2015 she won the Star Jalsha Paribar award in ‘Best Juti Movies With Dev‘ for ‘Bindaas‘ Film.
  • She achieves a Kalakar award in the “Queen Of Tollywood” category for her film ‘Shikari‘.

Salary and Net Worth

Srabanti Chatterjee’s earns almost is ₹25 lakh for every movie she plays as salary. Her estimated net worth of almost $1 Million.

Car collection

Srabanti Chatterjee has one black colored Audi Q6.

Contact Address

Facts about Srabanti Chatterjee

  • Srabanti got married at a very young age.
  • In 2003, after her 1st marriage, she took a break from the film industry and returned back in 2008.
  • Her married life was harsh with Rajiv and she filed divorce alleging him to be cruel and physically abused her a lot.
  • She first met Krishan Vraj (2nd husband) at commercial shooting in Mumbai.
  • In an interview, she said ‘I have been in two relationships before, one of them culminated into marriage, but both went kaput and there was so much bitterness in both the previous relationships.’
